title: Best of The Program | Guests: Candace Owens & WWII Vet Bill Kelly | 4/2/20
description:
In today’s coronavirus update, it’s been confirmed: China is LYING, and the WHO appears to have helped it. BLEXIT founder Candace Owens explains why she called out the governor of Connecticut for announcing a newborn death “related” to COVID-19. And she’s finally considering running for office! 95-year-old WWII vet Bill Kelly calls in after winning his battle against coronavirus! He discusses living through the crises of the Great Depression and Pearl Harbor and explains why he has hope for this generation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
